title: Dragon Sara Davies: ‘I don't know what the other Dragons are paid. It’s not the sort of subject you bring up over lunch'
text:
Sara Davies is the founder and owner of Crafter’s Companion, a global retail business specialising in craft tools.

At 35, she is the newest and youngest Dragon to appear on the BBC show, Dragons’ Den. Davies has won more than 25 business awards and in 2016 received an MBE for services to the economy.

She lives in Teesside with her husband, Simon, and their two children.

How did your childhood influence your work ethic?

I grew up in a little pit village on the outskirts of Durham. Both my parents ran small businesses and it undoubtedly made me the person I am today because I’ve only ever known them work incredibly hard.

My Dad ran all sorts of firms, including an ice cream van and mobile sweet...
description: Sara Davies is the founder and owner of Crafter’s Companion, a global retail business specialising in craft tools.
